meanings.sent1: Don't be a bonehead and forget your keys at home.
meanings.sent2: The bonehead at the store couldn't even count the change correctly.
meanings.sent3: The bonehead thought it was a good idea to wear shorts in the snow.
meanings.sent4: His actions were that of a bonehead, always making the wrong choices.
meanings.sent5: Being a bonehead in school will not get you good grades.

meanings.sent1: The bonehead couldn't understand the simple instructions.
meanings.sent2: She felt like a bonehead after missing the obvious clue.
meanings.sent3: The bonehead tried to fit a square peg into a round hole.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness made him a bonehead in the eyes of his friends.
meanings.sent5: Being a bonehead in this situation will only lead to trouble.
